name: com.ashera.hello
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.browser-run: cd platforms/browser/app && gradle execute && cd src/main/assets/www && http-server
scripts.generate-platform-res: cd platforms/android/app/src/main/gentool && npm install && npm run resize && npm run start
scripts.generate-platform-js: cd platforms/android/app/src/main/tsc && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean-start-windows: rmdir /s /q platforms node_modules plugins && cordova prepare && cd platforms/android/app/src/main/gentool && npm install && npm run fixIosSymLinks && npm run restore && npm run resize && cd ../tsc && npm install && cd ../gentool && npm run start skip_watch && cd ../tsc && npm run build

author: Apache Cordova Team
